body.name: Deeliva Wireless Mouse, Computer Mouse Wireless 2.4G USB Cordless Mouse with 3 Adjustable DPI, 6 Buttons, Ergonomic Portable Silent Mice for Laptop PC Computer (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 4 hrs 33 mins
features: 🖱【Stable & Delay-free Connection】：Even at a distance of 10 meters, our wireless mouse can also achieve a delay-free, and latency-free transmission with the upgraded 2.4G technology, allowing you to improve work efficiency, and to enjoy a more flexibility operation.

🖱【6 Buttons & 3 Adjustable DPI】: The wireless mouse for laptop offer additional thumb buttons that let you navigate forward and back in your web browser. And our computer mouse has 3 adjustable DPI -800/1200/1600(default 1200) that meet your needs from web browsing, Photoshop, to gaming. Our laptop mouse wireless is ideal for work，leisure，and entertainment.

🖱【Silent & Quiet Typing】: Are you bothered that the clicky sound when your’re using muse? Have you found that its awkward to use the noisy mouse in the cafe or library? That is why we design this computer mouse wireless in quiet-clicking. Thus no more worried about disturbing others.

🖱【Broad Compatibility】: Compatible wit up to 99% USB-enabled desktop & laptop devices, our mouse wireless is work with win/7/8/10/11 system, Linux system, Mac OS system, Chrome OS system. 【Important Notice: The USB receiver is placed in the bottom of the mouse. And if you found that the USB receiver is lost, please feel free to contact us for free replacement.】

🖱【Portable & Ergonomic Design】: As one of the necessary working accessoriey，comforty is important. That is why we designed this usb mouse wireless in streamlined design that fits in the palm of your hand, which ensure a more comfortable grip feeling. Suitable for teens, women, and men. A portable wireless computer mouse size of 4.25in*2.4in*1.46in is easy to slide into the pocket, bag, and convenient for you to take on the way you go.

🖱【Extra-long Battery Life】: This cordless mouse is powered by 1 AA battery (battery not included). After 1 minute of inactivity, the laptop mouse enters power saving mode, and after 8 minutes of inactivity, it enters sleep mode, which saves a lot of battery life and reduces the trouble of frequent battery replacement! Just double-click any button to wake up the USB mouse.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3 Levels Adjustable DPI 3 levels adjustable DPI (800/1200/1600), meet the needs of different screen sizes and different scenes. You can easily change the moving speed of the cursor by the DPI key. Long Battery Life Powered by 1 AA battery. With the auto-sleep mode and power switch, it can provide super-long battery life and avoid the trouble of changing the battery frequently. (*Battery life varies according to user and calculation conditions*) Plug and Play Super easy to use, no drivers needed. Just take out the USB Nano receiver from the bottom of the mouse, and plug it into your computer, then you are ready to go!

Perfect for Travel Deeliva wireless mouse is compact and portable, easy to take around from home to office, very suitable to travel with. Wide Compatibility Works well with laptop, desktops, computers and more devices. Compatible with Windows XP/7/8/10/, Linux, Mac OS, Chrome OS, etc. Tips and Package Battery is Not Included.Nano USB receiver stored in the battery compartment of the mouse.Package Included: 1*Wireless Mouse, 1*USB Receiver, 1*User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent mouse for my laptop
reviews.reviewText: Bought this during Prime Days at an incredibly low price for a special color mouse. It has very good feedback and most importantly, very good weighting. This replaced a logitek mouse that was so heavy and back-weighted, it slid around at the slightest body /laptop movement, which drove me crazy. This mouse is much more evenly weighted and while I refuse to use a mousepad, the slip & slide antics are now more reasonable and easier to control.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does it work? Yes
reviews.reviewText: Does it work? Yes. Is it great? NO! This silly thing is slick plastic, meaning it very easily gets slid off the desk or knee if you are using a laptop on the couch. And when it falls on the floor the thing blows apart like a kids toy thrown against the wall! The mouse goes one way, the battery cover another, and the battery goes rolling across the floor under the couch. If you find all the pieces you can put it back together and it will continue working, and it will survive multiple drops if you can find all the pieces!The good: It fits my hand well. It has "back" and "forward" buttons. And did I mention it is durable, if you can find all the pieces?Ok, addendum to the review. This POS fell on the floor for the last time. My blood glucose was really low, I was jumpy, I couldn't easily find the battery nor the back. That damned thing went flying across the room! It hit the trash can, bounced out and fell on the floor again! Amazon owes me a new mouse! Yes, it works but only if you are at a desk in a room with a carpeted floor!Ok, adding more to the review... I dug this thing out of the trash, put the battery back in, found the back and reinstalled it (taped it on this time!) and this thing is still working a month and a half later! These things are INCREDIBLY tough! And, when the battery compartment cover is taped on so it doesn't come off when it falls on the floor, they work really well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pros*Works Great* Perfect Color* Sleek Design* Comfortable to useCons* N/A

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this mouse because it was advertised as silent, but it is not. The buttons all make loud clicking noises, so I returned it. I did like the color, size and it was comfortable to use. If you don't care about it being silent, it seems like a nice mouse for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works on Mac Laptop
reviews.reviewText: Went with an inexpensive mouse since I tend to lose or break them when dropped on the floor too often. As such, this mouse works good enough for the price range. There is some initial lag when it has sat still for just a few minutes. Same goes for roller. Not as quick to get going as a few other inexpensive pointing devices I have used. Also, the click is way to soft and subtle for my preference but it is accurate in function and timing. Overall, good choice for the price but if you want the very best and most alert and highly sensitive mouse, this may not be the best choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Mouse stopped working 2 months of using it. Not worth it.
reviews.reviewText: Light weight and small enough to place in back pack. However it did not last. Just under two months of using it, it stopped working. Not worth the money spent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent but the sleep mode is excessive
reviews.reviewText: It works well but once it’s in “sleep mode”, you have to beat it, click it a thousand times, and/or shake it excessively to wake it up. The lag for it to wake up is utterly obnoxious. If you’re as impatient as I am, find one without a “sleep mode”.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mouse around the house
reviews.reviewText: Worked great…as soon as I bought a battery (not included). Now my laptop can travel with the moise. 2 day delivery
